_meanings:
{@--6@} Highly
or acutely accented (as a Svara),
see below.

{@--3@} A kind of musical 

instrument, a large drum.

{@--4@} A variety
of the hero; see {#DIrodAtta#}.

(In
<ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech which
describes supermundane 
prosperity, or an action of one that is
great represented collaterally to
the subject in hand;  
{#lokAtiSayasaMpattivarRanodAttamucyate . yadvApi prastutasyAMgaM mahatAM#}
{#caritaM Bavet ..#} <ls>S. D. 752</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> also  
<ls>K. P. 10</ls>; {#udAttaM vastunaH saMpanmahatAM copalakzaRaM#}.
